inclusion.criterion: therapy ≥6 months, based on prior 2-h BG ≥200 mg/dL, fasting BG ≥125 mg/dL (2 times) or HbA1c ≥6.5%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable renal allograft function >6 months; eGFR ≥30 mL/min/1.73m2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: undergoing an OGTT, lab work and urine analysis (including ketones, urinary culture)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with prior history of type 1 or type 2 diabetes
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 25-year-old man with type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago. He presents to the clinic with shortness of breath and fatigue during activities.
